arabic.title: ضميني
text: انا وانتي ح نبقى في ثانية

english.title: Dhomeny
text: Hold me in your arms, I'll forget the world and it's people
You and me we'll live in the moment, we'll have nothing but feelings
A feeling of love and of the spring of life
We'll be without a care in the world, and we won't listen to the talk of the people
Take me in your arms, hug me
I'm feeling for the first time
What is the sweetness of love except that one heart embraces another
And a lover saying to the beloved
I'm loving for the first time
